formalpara.title: Figure 4.
formalpara.para: (A) PDS-1000/He with Hepta adaptor. 1 = power switch 2 = vacuum switch 3 = fire switch. (B) Pressure divider with rupture disk in place. (C) Torque wrench used to screw pressure divider into bombardment chamber. (D) Vacuum pump used to evacuate the bombardment chamber.
